passwordDescription: Your password must be at least 6 characters
name: Name

successRegisterToast.title: Successful Registration
successRegisterToast.description: Your registration has been successfully created. Please click on the verification link sent to your email address to verify your account.

registerPermissionDescription: In order to use our application, you need to approve the permissions below.
kvkkText: Within the scope of the Personal Data Protection Law (KVKK), I have read, understood, and accept the information regarding the processing of my personal data.
privacyText: I have carefully read the Privacy Policy, understood how my personal information is collected, used, and protected, and I accept the Privacy Policy.
termsText: I have read the Terms of Use of the application, have been informed about the rules and obligations I must follow while using the site, and I accept these terms.
